effect.sword_shield: User swaps its stat modifiers with the target.

short_effect.sword_shield: User and target swap stat changes.
short_effect.the_isle_of_armor: User and target swap stat changes.
short_effect.the_crown_tundra: User and target swap stat changes.

flavor_text.sword_shield: This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.
flavor_text.legends_arceus: The user employs its psychic power to switch stat changes with the target.
